column1: Flip - Can someone please help they’re coming in
Gabu - I just got up, do you need help?
Flip - Holy shit I could use some help over here!
Sud - I think they are here
Pop - I can't see them anymore
Cup - Are they still coming in?
Sud - Actually I can’t see them either
Flip - All clear over here now
Sud - So are they not coming in anymore?
Pop - I’m not ready yet but soon will be ready
Flip - Ok I’ll do my best but they are coming in now
Pop - They are getting in now!!
Gabu - I thought they weren’t coming in but they are coming in
Gabu - I wasn’t ready but I am now
Flip - Wait I’m not ready now
Gabu - Flip you need to get ready now
Flip - OK READY BUT THEY ARE COMING IN
Gabu - Can we get a quick call on who’s ready
Sud - Shit, I think they’re coming in. Should I get reinforcements??
Sud - That’s it, I’m calling in reinforcements. They are coming in now
Sip - I'm ready. Pretty sure they're coming in
Sip - Okay I'm ready if they get in
Flip - Ok well they’re getting in
Pop - Scrip are you ready yet
Scrip - I just checked. It’s not them it’s something different. So they are not coming in yet.
Scrip - They’re not coming in anymore
Flip - Ok chill was freaked for a sec
Sip - Wait, did anyone hear that?!
Sip - They are coming in, who’s ready?
Flip - Almost ready but not quite
Sud - THEY ARE COMING IN NOW
Sip - Please help they are coming in
Sud - Could really use some help over here
Scrip - Everyone relax I just checked and it is not them
Scrip - Oh wait, I just checked again it is them
Sip - Okay shit is everyone ready?
Sip - Gonna need some fricken help over here
Flip - THEY GOT IN OVER HERE
Flip - They are not coming in anymore over here but some got in
Sip - Wait so some got in?
Pop - Wait are they still in?!
Flip - Yeah some are still in
Sip - Does anyone know if they are in??
Sip - Is everyone ready to get them out? We will need everyone
Sip - Everyone please help get them out
Flip - That’s it I’m sick of them being in
Sip - Fuck this, I'm going in too
Sip - THEY'RE GOING TO GET IN
Sip - I couldn't stop them from getting in so some more are in now
Flip - Managed to push some back over here
Sud - I can’t see or hear any over here. Possibly they aren’t coming in
Cup - I think it was a false alarm maybe
Scrip - Everyone I’ll be honest they’ve actually come in and they’ve got me. They’ve honestly got me. So this is it for me because they’ve come in and got me. Goodbye
Flip - EVERYONE WE NEED TO GET SCRIP BACK
Scrip - ok so am I back now?
Sip - I thought we lost Scrip. Alright, now let’s get the rest of them out
All: *chants* Get them out, get them out (chants)
Sip - All clear over here too. How'd everyone else do?
Cup - There are a couple left over here
Cup - Can someone come and give me a hand?
Sud - They aren’t coming in here
Sud - Oh actually, now they are coming in
Sip - If they are coming in i'm here to help
Scrip - I can’t see anything coming in over here
Sip - I can't see them either
Pop - I saw something but not sure if it was them
Sip - I could have sworn I saw something just then... But me dono
Scrip - Oh well.. Would anyone like to play some cards?
Cup - Deal me in I guess
Sip - Wait what if they come in
Sip - Okay but if they come in we are ready to help
Sud - Ok, I stopped watching for a bit and I think some might have got in
Gabu - Okay this is serious. They are coming in now. We need a ‘ready’ call in from everyone asap. You’re not allowed to say ‘not ready’. This is serious now.
Flip - Ok ready where do you need me
Gabu - North west entrance I think
Scrip - Yeah they are coming in over here
Sip - I'm at the north west entrance and they're not coming in here...
Pop - I thought I was at north west but I'm actually south west and they're coming in!!
Sip - But if I'm here where is everyone?!
Sip - Wait maybe they changed it?
Pop - Hurry up they are getting me
Sip - They changed it I can't find you, are you sure they are getting you?
Pop - South West and yes they are getting me
Sud - WAIT I THINK I’M LOST
Pop - They have got 20% of me hurry
Sip - I'm here, lets get them out
Cup - I’m gonna try and get that 20% back
Sip - Okay let’s get it back now
Scrip - We are getting them out
Cup - Can't find the other 10% where is it?
Cup - Wait if you found it… Then what 10% do I have here?
Pop - Not sure but please give it
Sip - we have to work together
Cup - But why should Pop get to have 110%
Pop - I am 90% I need 10% back
Sud - Seems unfair that Pop gets 110%
Pop - Ok 5% to Cup 5% to Sud
Pop - Cup is 105% Sud is 105% i am 90% Sip is 100% Flip is 100% Gabu is 100% Scrip is 100%
Gabu - No offence but this is bullshit
Gabu - You need to even out the %
Pop - Coast is clear atm wanna meet and sort out %?
Sud - I’m here. Where is everyone?
Sip - Okay I'm going for supplies, somebody cover for me
Cup - Pop you lost 20% but we found 30%
Pop - I don’t want to be rude but you have more % than me
Pop - Maybe Gabu Flip and Sip could donate some % to me?
Sud - I like the % as it is
Gabu - Sorry it’s just kinda rigged to have more than 100%
Sud - I just kind of like having an extra 5%
Sud - In case they get in and take some
Sud - But I would consider giving like 2% back
Sip - Okay I'm back with supplies

Scrip - Sorry I was watching but started thinking about the %
Scrip - All of them are now in
Scrip - All of them are now inside

Flip - There’s heaps more they’re not coming in yet but they’re about to come in
Sip - Maybe we should get out and leave them in??
Pop - Friggin hell GET THEM OUT
Sud - I can’t see any at the south entrance
Gabu - If you all would have just figured out the % they wouldn’t have come in
Sip - Maybe we should get out
Cup - I might take the extra % if no one wants it
Flip - Somebody help me I’m up top
Pop - Please follow me and we can get out
Sip - Get Out or Stay In?
Flip - Help I’m stuck up top!
Cup - Did we get all the % back? Or na?
Pop - Ok I’m here Flip follow me and we can get out
Pop - Ok Flip and I just got out
Sip - I just noticed too they are actually all in
Flip - Wait has anyone seen Scrip?
Sip - Please don’t tell me Scrip is still in

Gabu - Will you go back in?

Sud - Maybe we should try reasoning with them to get them out?
Pop - Ok who is going to talk to them
Flip - What if they get you??
Gabu - I think we have to risk it
Pop - Sud or Cup talk to them because you have more %

Flip - I wanna get in again so bad
Sud - Ok, I talked to them and they got 10% of me. They aren’t nice.
Flip - I can finally see why they would want to get in... and things are different now...
Sud - Cup, could I get that extra 5% off you?
Cup - Pop you are 100% stop lying
Cup - Scrip is still in there
Sip - I'm going back in to look
Sud - Sip, I took it, but it’s because I needed it
Flip - Ok so they’re in so it’s gonna be way harder this time round
Sud - I think we should get them out
Cup - It's weird being back in
Cup - Kinda same but different now
Sip - Yeah it is weird in here...
Sip - I actually can't see any of them

Sip - What does the note say?
Flip - Umm I think you’re gonna want to see this
Flip - Pop here’s the note you tell
Gabu - Who did you pass it to?
Cup - Who did you give the note to?
Pop - It’s a note from Scrip
Pop - You might want to read this
Sip - Why did you give Pop the note…
Sud - Wait who has the note?
Flip - Pop has it I think
Flip - I need to sit down after the news
Pop - I have it, a note from Scrip
Cup - I thought I had the note for a second but me dono
Pop - Who wants to read next
Sud - Sip, what does the note say?
Pop - Sorry wish I could tell but I’m in shock
Pop - I’m speechless only Sip can tell
Sud - Is Sip in or out?
Sud - I’m going to go get the note from Sip
Sip - Can you take the note and tell them Cup? I need to take a walk and think
Sip - I don't want to believe what I read
Flip - I can’t decide I’m too freaked
Cup - The note is about the %
Cup - Not sure I want to say anymore
Sip - Okay I'm just gonna say it
Sip - I can't keep the secret anymore
Flip - It’s true, Scrip has a large amount of it
Sip - I think maybe it was a trap and scrip took it while we were getting out

Flip - I couldn’t accept it at first but now all I wanna do is get it back

Sud - But I sort of thought Scrip was talking about something else
Gabu -  Should we get all the % back?
Flip - Even though Scrip took it we can’t take it all it’s not fair

Sip - How the frick can we even get it back
Flip - There’s a secret message in the note
Gabu- What does it say Flip?
Cup - I think Sip wrote that on

Cup - I reckon we should stop talking about it

Sip - Okay everyone I think I'm gonna find Scrip

Flip - Should help you with energy and give you some %
